sentences.en: " I am a Briton,'said Miss Pross, "
sentences.cn: “ 我可是个不列颠人, ” 普洛丝小姐说.

sentences.en: He is staying at Seaview Hotel, Princes'Avenue, Briton.
sentences.cn: 他住在不列顿市王子街的海景旅馆里.

sentences.en: He says that Johnson is a'typical Briton ', an'Everyman '.
sentences.cn: 他说约翰逊是一位 “ 典型的英国人 ” 、 一位 “ 英国普通人”.

sentences.en: He was a true Briton, and hoped there were many like him.
sentences.cn: 他是个真正的不列颠人, 但愿许多人都能像他一样.

sentences.en: However, the Briton is upbeat about patching things up and putting on a united front.
sentences.cn: 不过, 他却为大家的团结而感到高兴.

sentences.en: Potential customers already discussing the $ 100 million tickets include several Americans and one Briton, Anderson said.
sentences.cn: 安德森说,已经开始讨论价值一亿美元的“机票”的潜在客户包括几名美国人和一名英国人.

sentences.en: Some people say we Briton must work like beaver.
sentences.cn: 有人说我们英国人得拼命工作才行.

sentences.en: The Briton admitted that his current commercial arrangement with McLaren and Mercedes is for engines only.
sentences.cn: 英国人承认,他目前的商业安排,迈凯轮和梅塞德斯的引擎是唯一.

sentences.en: the first Briton to win a medal
sentences.cn: 第一位获奖章的英国人

sentences.en: The role is played by seventeen-year-old Briton Jane March.
sentences.cn: 这个角色由17岁的英国人简·马奇扮演。

sentences.en: Thousands of Irishmen volunteered to fight bravely and loyally for Briton throughout the conflict.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的爱尔兰人勇敢的、效忠英国的自愿参加整个冲突.

sentences.en: We are going to see the new production of an opera by Briton.
sentences.cn: 我们要去看布利顿的歌剧新作.

trans.tran_cn: 英国人，（大）不列颠人，布立吞人
